meanings.definition: Bring or come to a stop.
meanings.sent1: The red light halts the cars at the intersection.
meanings.sent2: The train halts at the station to let passengers on and off.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel halts its nut-gathering to chase a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: His heart halts for a moment as he sees her smile.
meanings.sent5: The sudden thunderstorm halts the outdoor picnic abruptly.

meanings.sent1: The unexpected halt in production caused delays in delivery.
meanings.sent2: The bus made a brief halt at the rest area for passengers to stretch.
meanings.sent3: The halt in the music concert was due to technical difficulties.
meanings.sent4: The sudden halt in the conversation left an awkward silence.
meanings.sent5: The halt in the rain allowed the children to play outside again.
